title: We are expanding and hiring a Remote Google Ads & Meta Ads Account Manager to join our marketing team.
job_overview:
We are expanding and hiring a Remote Google Ads & Meta Ads Account Manager to join our marketing team.
Send your CV: Upgrade to see actual info

Salary: $3000 - $5000/month depending on performance

Your duties:

Manage daily advertising activities on Google and Meta.

Focus on campaign efficiency and KPIs.

Provide regular performance reporting.

Requirements:

1+ year experience running paid media ads.

Comfortable working remotely with minimal supervision.
